price: 82. Degene waar ik op hoop dat hij mijn fouten op de Dag der Vergoeding vergeeft.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡمَعُ أَن يَغۡفِرَ لِي خَطِيٓـَٔتِي يَوۡمَ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī aṭmaʿu an yaghfira lī khaṭīatī yawma al-dīni
